dialogue.content: My skin has been breaking out more lately.
Is it mostly on your face, back, or both?
Mostly my face, especially around the jaw.
Got it. Do you have a skincare routine right now?
Not consistent. I skip steps when I'm tired.
Okay. Do you want a minimal routine or are you open to multiple products?
Minimal. I'll quit if it's too much.
Understood. A simple, consistent routine can still help.
If I could keep it to two steps and actually do it daily, that would be perfect.
